Take existing sra accs, filter for MGX, split off participant number
```{r}
sras_og <- readr::read_csv("sra_accs/sra-manifest.csv")
```


```{r}
sras <- sras_og %>%
  separate(`Experiment Title`, c(NA,"smplID_smpltype"), "Subject ")%>%
  separate(smplID_smpltype, c("smpl_ID", "smpl_type"), "_")%>%
  filter(smpl_type == "MGX")%>%
  separate(smpl_ID, c("partp", "week"), 5, remove=F)%>%
  arrange(partp, week)
```

```{r}
sras_2_subset <- sras %>%
  filter(partp == "H4009" | partp == "C3017")%>%
  write_csv("sras_H4009_C3017.csv")
```
```{r}
barplot(table(sras$partp))
sras_num <- as.matrix(table(sras$partp))
```
